summary: Trauma is a widespread, harmful, and costly public health problem, and is especially detrimental to children. Any frightening, dangerous, or violent event that threatens a child or their loved ones may be traumatic. While not every child suffers lasting effects, trauma significantly increases the risk of mental health and other problems. Among other things, we interviewed and surveyed officials in 6 states on the challenges...
title: Children Affected by Trauma: Selected States Report Various Approaches and Challenges to Supporting Children
